stepWelcome.title: Welcome to Ledger
stepWelcome.subtitle: Safely manage your cryptos from your smartphone.

warning.title: Get started in English
warning.desc: We are introducing additional languages in order to help your onboarding with Ledger. Please be aware that the rest of the Ledger experience is currently only available in English.

firstUse.title: First time using this Nano?
firstUse.label: First use
firstUse.subTitle: Set up a new Nano
firstUse.desc: Let’s start and set up your device!

devicePairing.title: Already have a recovery phrase?
devicePairing.label: Device pairing
devicePairing.subTitle: Connect your Nano
devicePairing.desc: Your device is already set up? Connect it to the app!

desktopSync.title: Already have a recovery phrase?
desktopSync.label: Desktop sync
desktopSync.subTitle: Sync crypto from your desktop app
desktopSync.desc: Already got the desktop app? Sync it to manage your crypto from your smartphone!

restoreDevice.label: Restore device
restoreDevice.subTitle: Restore your recovery phrase on a new device
restoreDevice.desc: Use an existing recovery phrase to restore your private keys on a new Nano!

0.label: Basics
0.title: Access your crypto
0.desc: Your crypto assets are stored on the blockchain. You need a private key to access and manage them.

1.label: Basics
1.title: Own your private key
1.desc: Your private key is stored within your Nano and you must be the only one to own it to be in control of your money.

2.label: Basics
2.title: Stay offline
2.desc: Your Nano works as a "cold storage" wallet. This means that it never exposes your private key online, even when using the app.

3.label: Basics
3.title: Validate transactions
3.desc: Ledger Live allows you to buy, sell, manage, exchange and earn crypto while remaining protected. You will validate every crypto transaction with your Nano.

4.label: Basics
4.title: Let’s set up your Nano!
4.desc: We'll start by setting up your Nano security.

start.title: The best way to get you started:

0.label: Plan 30 minutes and take your time.

1.label: Grab a pen to write with.

2.label: Stay alone, and choose a safe and quiet environment.

warning.title: Please be careful
warning.desc: Make sure you follow the instructions on this app at every step of the process.

nanoX.label: Turn on your device by pressing the black button for 1 second.

nanoS.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone.

blue.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone and pressing the power button.

1.title: Browse
1.label: Learn how to interact with your device by reading the on-screen instructions.

2.title: Select “Set up as new device”
2.label: Press both buttons simultaneously to validate the selection.

3.title: Follow instructions
3.label: Come back here to follow instructions on your PIN code.

pinCode.title: PIN code
pinCode.desc: Your PIN code is the first layer of security. It physically secures access to your Nano and your private keys. Your PIN code must be 4 to 8 digits long.
pinCode.checkboxDesc: I understand that I must choose my PIN code by myself and keep it private.

0.title: Choose PIN code
0.label: Press the left or right button to change digits. Press both buttons to validate a digit. Select <1></1> to confirm your PIN code. Select <2></2> to erase a digit.

1.title: Confirm PIN code
1.label: Enter your PIN code again to confirm it.

0.label: Always choose a PIN code by yourself.

1.label: Always enter your PIN code out of sight.

2.label: You can change your PIN code if needed.

3.label: Three wrong PIN code entries in a row will reset the device.

4.label: Never use an easy PIN code like 0000, 123456, or 55555555.

5.label: Never share your PIN code with someone else. Not even with Ledger.

6.label: Never use a PIN code you did not choose yourself.

7.label: Never store your PIN code on a computer or phone.

recoveryPhrase.title: Recovery phrase
recoveryPhrase.desc: Your recovery phrase is a secret list of 24 words that backs up your private keys. Your Nano generates a unique recovery phrase. Ledger does not keep a copy of it.
recoveryPhrase.checkboxDesc: I understand that if I lose this recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to my Nano.

infoModal.title: How does a recovery phrase work?
infoModal.desc: Your recovery phrase works like a unique master key. Your Ledger device uses it to calculate private keys for every crypto asset you own.
infoModal.desc_1: To restore access to your crypto, any wallet can calculate the same private keys from your recovery phrase.
infoModal.title_1: What if I lose access to my Nano?

1.label: Select “Restore recovery phrase on a new device” in the Ledger app.

2.label: Enter your recovery phrase on your new device to restore access to your crypto.

0.title: Take your Recovery sheet
0.label: Grab a blank Recovery sheet, included with your Nano. Please reach out to Ledger Support if the Recovery sheet did not come blank.

1.title: Write down all words
1.label: Write Word #1 displayed on your Nano in position 1 of your Recovery sheet. Then press right on your Nano to display Word #2 and write it down in position 2. Repeat the process for all words while carefully respecting the order and spelling. Press left on your Nano to check for any mistakes.

2.title: Confirm your recovery phrase
2.label: Scroll through the words until you find Word #1 by pressing the right button. Validate by pressing both buttons.

hideRecoveryPhrase.title: Hide your recovery phrase
hideRecoveryPhrase.desc: Your recovery phrase is your last chance to access your crypto if you cannot use your Nano. You must keep it in a safe place.

0.label: Enter these words on a hardware wallet only, never on computers or phones.

1.label: Never share your 24 words with anyone, not even with Ledger.

infoModal.label: Learn how to hide it
infoModal.title: Where should I keep my recovery phrase?

0.label: <1>NEVER</1> enter it on a computer, phone or any other device. Don't take a picture of it.

2.label: <1>ALWAYS</1> store it in a secure place, out of sight.

3.label: Ledger will never ask for your recovery phrase.

4.label: If any person or application asks for it, assume it is a scam!

warning.title: Now game on!
warning.desc: Answer 3 simple questions to avoid common misconceptions about your hardware wallet.

importRecoveryPhrase.title: Restore from recovery phrase
importRecoveryPhrase.desc: Restore your Nano from your recovery phrase to restore, replace or back up your Ledger hardware wallet.
importRecoveryPhrase.desc_1: Your Nano will restore your private keys and you will be able to access and manage your crypto.

warning.title: We recommend Ledger recovery phrases only
warning.desc: Ledger cannot guarantee the security of external recovery phrases. We recommend setting up your Nano as a new device if your recovery phrase was not generated by a Ledger.

nanoX.label: Turn on your device by pressing the black button for 1 second.

nanoS.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone.

blue.label: Turn on your device by connecting it to the USB port of your phone and pressing the power button.

1.title: Browse
1.label: Learn how to interact with your device by reading the on-screen instructions.

2.title: Select “Restore from recovery phrase”
2.label: Press both buttons simultaneously to validate the selection.

3.title: Follow instructions
3.label: Come back here to follow instructions on your PIN code.

existingRecoveryPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase is the secret list of words that you backed up when you first set up your wallet.
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Ledger does not keep a copy of your recovery phrase.
existingRecoveryPhrase.checkboxDesc: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to my Nano.

1.title: Select recovery phrase length
1.label: Your Recovery phrases can have 12, 18 or 24 words. You must enter all words to access your crypto.

2.title: Enter Word #1...
2.label: Enter the first letters of Word #1 by selecting them with the right or left button. Press both buttons to validate each letter.

3.title: Validate Word #1...
3.label: Choose Word #1 from the suggestions. Press both buttons to validate.

nanoX.title: Pair your Nano
nanoX.desc: This is the first time you’re setting up your Nano with this phone. Let’s quickly pair your device.

nanoS.title: Connect your Nano
nanoS.desc: This is the first time you’re setting up your Nano with this phone. Let’s quickly connect your device.

blue.title: Connect your Blue
blue.desc: This is the first time you’re setting up your Blue with this phone. Let’s quickly connect your device.

infoModal.title: Where can I find my device name?
infoModal.desc: On your device, select Settings > General > Device name.
infoModal.title_1: How to set up Bluetooth connection?
infoModal.title_2: How do I use my Nano X without Bluetooth?
infoModal.desc_1: Use an <1>OTG-cable</1> to connect your Ledger Nano X to your Android smartphone (iOS not supported). Manage your crypto with Ledger Live mobile or any other compatible (web) app.

0.label: Make sure Bluetooth is enabled on your smartphone and on your Ledger Nano X. Your Ledger Nano X should be on the Dashboard, its main home screen.

1.label: <1>{{Os}}</1>: Make sure location services are enabled in your phone's settings for Ledger Live. Ledger Live never uses your location information, this is a requirement for Bluetooth on {{Os}}.

2.label: If you have a Bluetooth pairing issue, please refer to the following article

errorInfoModal.title: Something went wrong?
errorInfoModal.desc: If you're experiencing Bluetooth issues with your Nano X, please remove the pairing and forget Nano X on your phone. Then try the pairing again.
errorInfoModal.desc_1: It may take a while before the Bluetooth pairing request is displayed. Make sure you verify and confirm the pairing code both on your Nano X and on your phone.
errorInfoModal.desc_2: Check in your phone's Bluetooth settings whether the Ledger Nano X is detected. If it not detected, make sure you turn on the Bluetooth on your Ledger Nano X.
errorInfoModal.desc_4: If the Ledger Nano X is not detected in your mobile app when trying to pair it, please try the following solution:
errorInfoModal.desc_5: Ledger mobile app asks you to allow location services when it's not enabled yet, but on a few phone models, this is not always properly detected. Please note that Ledger mobile app never uses your location information, this permission is simply required for Bluetooth on Android.
errorInfoModal.desc_6: Some users have reported having fixed their connection issues by updating the Android version running on their phone to a newer one. Please check with your phone manufacturer whether an update is available.

0.label: Navigate to the system options for the Ledger Live app on your Android phone.

1.label: Allow the location to be used.

3.label: Check whether your Nano X is detected.

stepImportAccounts.title: Sync crypto from desktop
stepImportAccounts.desc: If you already have your crypto set up in the Ledger desktop app, you can sync them to manage them from your phone.

0.label: On the Desktop app, select <1>Settings > Accounts > Account export</1>.

1.label: Scan the LiveQR code with your phone.

2.label: Select the crypto accounts to import.

warning.title: Your desktop and mobile apps must be synced manually.
warning.desc: Ledger Live respects your privacy and stores your data locally. If you change accounts and settings on your phone, you will need to do the same on your computer, and vice versa. Your transactions stay synchronized with the blockchain.

stepSetupPin.step1: Turn on your {{fullDeviceName}} and follow the instructions.
stepSetupPin.step1-nanoS: Connect your {{fullDeviceName}} to your phone using an OTG cable.
stepSetupPin.step2: Press both buttons together to select <1><1>Setup as a new device.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step2-restore: Press both buttons together to select <1><1>Restore from recovery phrase.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step3: Press left or right button to select a digit. Press buttons together to confirm.

modal.step3: Never use a device with a PIN or recovery phrase already setup

stepWriteRecovery.step1: Write <1><1>Word #1</1></1> in entry 1 on a blank Recovery sheet
stepWriteRecovery.step2: Press the right button and continue to write down all 24 words.
stepWriteRecovery.step3: Confirm each word of your recovery phrase: select it then confirm it by pressing both buttons together.

modal.step1: Store your 24-word recovery phrase in a safe place, out of sight.
modal.step2: Make sure you are the only person to have the recovery phrase.
modal.step3: Ledger does not save your recovery phrase.
modal.step4: Never use a device with a recovery phrase or PIN already setup.

stepPassword.desc: Set a password to protect Ledger Live data on your phone.

modal.step1: Keep your password safe. Do not share it.
modal.step2: Keep your password safe. Losing it means resetting Ledger Live and loading the accounts again.
modal.step3: Resetting Ledger Live has no impact on your crypto assets.

stepFinish.title: Your device is ready!
stepFinish.desc: Install apps on your device and manage your portfolio

coins.title: As a Ledger user, my crypto is stored:

modal.text: Your crypto is always stored on the blockchain. Your hardware wallet only holds your private key, which gives you access to your crypto.

recoveryPhrase.title: If my recovery phrase is no longer secret and safe...

answers.correct: My crypto is no longer safe and I need to transfer them to a secure place
answers.wrong: No problem, Ledger can send me a copy

modal.text:
Anyone who knows your recovery phrase can steal your crypto assets. 
If you lose it, you must quickly transfer your crypto to a secure place.

privateKey.title: When I connect my Nano to the Ledger app, my private key is...

modal.text: Your private key always remains offline in your hardware wallet. Even when connected to your Nano, the Ledger app cannot access your private key. You must physically authorize every transaction on your device.

final.successText: You are ready to safely manage your crypto. Only one quick step left!
final.failTitle: You will soon become a pro...
final.failText: Don’t worry, Ledger is here to guide you through your journey. You will soon feel extra comfortable about your crypto safety. Only one quick step left!

transactionsPendingConfirmation.title: Unsynchronized balance
transactionsPendingConfirmation.desc: Some transactions are not confirmed yet. These will be reflected in your balance and useable after being confirmed.

display.exchangeDesc: Set provider of exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}

display.developerModeDesc: Show developer apps in the Manager and enable Testnet apps.

display.technicalDataDesc: Ledger will automatically collect anonymized technical data to improve user experience.

technicalDataModal.bullet2: Ledger Live version, OS region, language and region

display.hideEmptyTokenAccountsDesc: Hide empty token accounts on the Accounts page.

currencies.rateProviderDesc: Choose the provider of the rate between {{currencyTicker}} and Bitcoin.
currencies.confirmationNbDesc: Set the number of network confirmations for transactions to be approved.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.desc: Manage assets display in the app.
accounts.blacklistedTokensDesc: You can hide tokens by going to the accounts list then long-pressing on the token and selecting 'Hide token'.

blacklistedTokensModal.title: Hide token
blacklistedTokensModal.desc: This action will hide all <1><0>{tokenName}</0></1> accounts, you can show them again using <3>Settings > Accounts</3>.

cryptoAssets.desc: Select a crypto assets to edit its settings.

liveReview.title: Rate the app!
liveReview.android: Review in the Google Play store

help.title: Help
help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or how to get help.
help.supportDesc: If you have a problem, get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.configureDeviceDesc: Set up as a new device or restore an existing device. Accounts and settings are preserved.
help.clearCacheDesc: The transactions on the network will be scanned and your accounts will be recalculated.
help.clearCacheModalDesc: A fresh and complete scan of transactions on the network will be done. Account histories will be rebuilt and balances will be recalculated.
help.exportLogsDesc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may help troubleshooting.
help.hardResetDesc: This has no impact on your assets. Erases all data in Ledger Live, including account data, transaction histories and settings. Use your Ledger device to reload and manage your crypto assets on an empty Ledger Live.
help.repairDeviceDesc: If you have an issue updating your device and cannot resume updates, you can try this to repair your device.

experimental.title: Experimental features
experimental.desc: Try out the Experimental features and let us know what you think.
experimental.disclaimer: These are Experimental features provided on an "as is" basis for our community of tech enthusiasts. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

overview.title: Ledger Live accounts update
overview.subtitle: New features in Ledger Live means your accounts need to be updated
overview.notice: {{accountCount}} account could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the account below.
overview.notice_plural: {{accountCount}} accounts could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the accounts below.

pending.title: {{currency}} update in progress
pending.subtitle: Please wait for your account to be updated.

notice.title: {{currency}} update incomplete
notice.subtitle: No {{currency}} accounts could be updated using this device.

done.title: {{currency}} update complete
done.subtitle: Congratulations, your {{currency}} accounts were updated successfully.

receive.title: Receive
receive.verifySkipped: Your receive address was not confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify your {{accountType}} address to stay secure.
receive.verifyPending: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address displayed on your device exactly matches the one displayed on your phone.
receive.verified: Address confirmed. Check again if you copied or scanned it.
receive.withoutDevice: You do not have your device

notSynced.desc: This may take a moment if you have many transactions or if you have a slow internet connection.

readOnly.title: Receive
readOnly.desc: You are about to view an address which was not verified. Verify addresses on your device to stay secure.
readOnly.verify: The address of {{accountType}} was not verified. Verify addresses on your device to stay secure.

landing.title: Welcome to Swap
landing.disclaimer: Exchange crypto directly from your Ledger device. This service is not available in some countries, including the US.

kyc.disclaimer: I acknowledge that my location data will be shared with third parties for compliance purposes.

notAvailable.title: Service temporarily unavailable, or not available in your country

pendingOperation.description: Your Swap operation has been sent to the network for confirmation. It may take up to an hour before you receive your swapped crypto assets.
pendingOperation.label: Your Swap ID:
pendingOperation.title: Pending operation
pendingOperation.disclaimer: Please take note of your Swap ID number in case you’d need assistance from {{provider}} later.

noApp.title: {{appName}} app not installed
noApp.desc: Please go to Manager to install the {{appName}} app.

noAccounts.title: No {{ticker}} to swap
noAccounts.desc: Your {{currencyName}} accounts have no balance to swap.

outdatedApp.title: App update available
outdatedApp.desc: You need to update the {{appName}} app.

disclaimer.title: Terms and conditions
disclaimer.desc: By clicking “Accept”,  I acknowledge and accept that this service is exclusively governed by {{provider}}'s Terms & Conditions.

missingApp.title: Please install the Exchange app on your device
missingApp.description: Go to manager and install Exchange app to swap assets

outdatedApp.title: Please update the Exchange app on your device
outdatedApp.description: Go to manager and update Exchange app to swap assets

emptyState.title: No {{currency}} account
emptyState.description: You need to add an account before swapping {{currency}}

empty.title: Your previous swaps will appear here
empty.desc: Either you have not made any swaps yet, or Ledger Live has been reset in the meantime.

highFees.title: High fees on Ethereum
highFees.description: Due to congestion on the Ethereum network, you may experience high fees when issuing transactions.

account.currencyAPYTooltip: Yearly return rate of a deposit that’s continuously compounded
account.accruedInterestsTooltip: Interest generated on your lent assets
account.interestEarnedTooltip: Interest you have earned after withdrawal

banners.needApproval: You need to approve this account before being able to lend assets.
banners.fullyApproved: You have fully approved this account. You can reduce the amount at a fee.
banners.approvedCanReduce: You have approved <0>{{value}}</0> on this account. You can reduce the amount at a fee.
banners.approvedButNotEnough: You have approved <0>{{value}}</0> on this account.
banners.approving: You can deposit assets once the account approval is confirmed.
banners.notEnough: You must increase the limit approved on your account to lend.

dashboard.emptySateDescription: You can lend assets directly from your Ethereum accounts and earn interest.

closedLoans.description: View all your withdrawn loans and the interest you have earned.

history.description: View the history of all your loan transactions.

terms.label: Lend crypto
terms.title: Lend assets on the Compound Protocol
terms.description: The Compound protocol allows you to lend and borrow assets on the Ethereum network. You can lend assets and earn interest directly from your Ledger acccount.
terms.switchLabel: I have read and agree with the <0><0>Terms of Use</0></0>.

1.label: Step 1/3
1.title: Approving an account allows the protocol to process future loans.
1.description: You need to authorize the Compound smart contract to transfer up to a certain amount of assets to the protocol. Enabling an account gives permission to the protocol to process future loans.

2.label: Step 2/3
2.title: Deposit assets to earn interest.
2.description: Once an account is approved, you can select the amount of assets you want to lend and issue a transaction to the protocol. Interest accrue immediately after the transaction is confirmed.

3.label: Step 3/3
3.title: Withdraw assets at any time.
3.description: You can withdraw your assets and earned interest at any time, partially or entirely, directly from your Ledger account.

info.title: You don’t have {{ name }} account.
info.description: In order to deposit funds and lend crypto you need a {{ name }} account. Please Receive funds on your Ethereum address.

info.title: This account is not approved
info.description: You need to approve an account before being able to lend this asset.

selectAccount.enabledAccountsNoLimit: You have {{number}} account that approved an unlimited amount of {{ currency }}
selectAccount.enabledAccountsNoLimit_plural: You have {{number}} accounts that approved an unlimited amount of {{ currency }}
selectAccount.noEnabledAccounts: You need to approve an account before you can lend.

enable.summary: <0>I grant the </0><1>{{contractName}}</1><0> smart contract access to my </0><1>{{accountName}}</1><0> account for a </0><1>{{amount}}</1><0> amount</0>

advanced.amountLabelTooltip: This limits the amount available to the smart contract.

validation.info: The approval was sent to the network for confirmation. You’ll be able to issue loans once it is confirmed.
validation.extraInfo: Transactions can take some time to be displayed in an explorer and to be confirmed.

validation.info: You will start earning interest once the network has confirmed the deposit.
validation.extraInfo: Transactions can take some time to be displayed in an explorer and to be confirmed.

validation.info: Your assets will be available once the network has confirmed the withdrawal.

tooMuchUTXOBottomModal.description: This transaction may take long to verify and sign because the account has a significant number of coins.
tooMuchUTXOBottomModal.title: UTXO message

send.highFeeModal: Be careful, network fees are greater than <1>10%</1> of the amount. Do you want to continue?

scan.title: Scan QR code
scan.descBottom: Please center the QR code inside the square.

fallback.title: Enable camera
fallback.desc: Please enable Camera in Settings to scan QR codes.

recipient.verifyAddress: Please verify the address matches the one shared by the recipient.

summary.subaccountsWarning: You will need to refill this account with {{ currency }} in order to send the tokens of this account
summary.infoTotalDesc: Includes transaction amount and the selected network fees

validation.message: On your device, confirm the transaction to sign it securely.
validation.confirm: Your account balance will be updated once the network confirms the transaction.

fees.title: Network fees
fees.higherFaster: Higher gas price means a faster confirmation.
fees.ethTokenNetworkFees: Network fees for ERC20 token operations are paid in ETH.

info.description: Freeze TRX to earn rewards securely, keeping control of your assets.

steps.1: You can unfreeze your assets after 3 days.
steps.2: Freeze and vote securely with your Ledger device.

validation.message: Always verify that your device displays the address exactly as it was originally given to you.
validation.info: You will start earning {{resource}} once the network has confirmed the freeze. You can shortly vote for Super Representatives to also earn rewards.

button.pendingDesc: Please wait a moment before voting.

amount.title: Select the type of asset to unfreeze
amount.info: Unfreezing will decrease your {{resource}} and will cancel all your votes.

validation.info: Your {{resource}} points will be decreased and all your votes will be canceled.

validation.success: Your rewards were added to the available balance.

validation.message: Always verify that your device displays the address exactly as it was originally given to you.

quitConfirmation.title: Cancel add account
quitConfirmation.desc: Are you sure you want to cancel adding accounts?

success.desc: View your accounts or add other accounts

addAccounts.synchronizingDesc: Your accounts are being synchronized. This can take a while...
addAccounts.noAccountToCreate: Could not create <1><0>{{currencyName}}</></> account. Restart the process and sync your accounts.
addAccounts.cantCreateAccount: A new account cannot be added before receiving assets on your <1><0>{{accountName}}</></> account.

erc20.title: Add token
erc20.disclaimer:
{{tokenName}} is an ERC20 Token.
You can receive tokens directly in an Ethereum account.

trc10.disclaimer:
{{tokenName}} is a TRC10 Token.
You can receive tokens directly in a Tron account.

{{tokenName}} is a TRC20 Token.

verifyAddress.title: Verify address on device
verifyAddress.description: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address to be shown in Ledger Live matches the one on your Ledger device.

confirmSwap.title: Confirm swap operation on device
confirmSwap.alert: Verify the Swap details on your device before sending it. The addresses are exchanged securely so you don’t have to verify them.

confirmSell.title: Confirm sell operation on device
confirmSell.alert: Verify the Sell details on your device before sending it. The addresses are exchanged securely so you don’t have to verify them.

SelectDevice.title: Pair new device
SelectDevice.headerDescription: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled
SelectDevice.usbLabel: Connect USB cable and enter your PIN Code on your device

description.ble: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked and within range
description.usb: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked

genuineCheckPending.title: Checking if the device is genuine...

dashboard.title: Return to the Dashboard on your {{productName}}

footer.appInstalled: You don't have the app installed

receiveVerify.title: Verify address on device
receiveVerify.description: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address displayed in Ledger Live exactly matches the one displayed on your Ledger device.

getDeviceName.title: Press both buttons together to enable reading the device name.

editDeviceName.title: Press both buttons together to enable setting the device name.

Paired.title: Pairing successful
Paired.desc: Your {{productName}} is ready to be used with Ledger Live.

Pairing.step1: Validate if the code displayed on your phone exactly matches the one displayed on your {{productName}}.
Pairing.step2: Validate on your {{productName}} by pressing both buttons together.

GenuineCheck.title: Device authentication check
GenuineCheck.accept: Please don't turn off your Nano X. Make sure you allow <1>Ledger Manager</1>.

ScanningHeader.title: Looking for devices

ScanningTimeout.title: Sorry, no device was found
ScanningTimeout.desc: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked and Bluetooth is enabled.

manager.title: Manager
manager.tokenAppDisclaimer: {{tokenName}} is an {{tokenType}} token using the {{appName}} app. To manage {{tokenName}}, <1>install the {{appName}} app</1> and send the tokens <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>.
manager.tokenAppDisclaimerInstalled: {{tokenName}} is an {{tokenType}} token using the {{appName}} app. To manage {{tokenName}}, <1>open the {{appName}} app</1> and send the tokens <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>.

readOnly.title: Nano X
readOnly.description: Setup Ledger Live with your Ledger Nano X to install apps, create accounts and make secure transactions wherever you go.
readOnly.question: Do you have your Ledger Nano X?

appList.title: App catalog
appList.noAppsInstalled: No apps installed on your device
appList.noAppsDescription: Go to the App catalog to install apps
appList.noResultsDesc: Please verify the spelling and try again

uninstall.title: Uninstall all
uninstall.subtitle: Uninstall all apps?
uninstall.description: Uninstalling apps has no impact on your crypto assets. You can reinstall apps in the App catalog.

remove.title: Remove device
remove.description: Are you sure? You can add your {{productName}} again at any time.

installSuccess.title: App installed successfully, you can now add your {{app}} accounts
installSuccess.title_plural: Apps installed successfully, you can now add your accounts
installSuccess.notSupported: App installed successfully, find out more about the installed apps on our website.

firmware.outdated: Device firmware version too old to be updated. Please contact Ledger Support for a replacement.
firmware.modalTitle: Firmware update only available on Ledger Live Desktop
firmware.modalDesc: Please download Ledger Live on your computer to update the device firmware.

loading.title: Installing {{appName}}
loading.desc: Please wait for the {{appName}} app to be installed

dependency.title: {{dependency}} app is needed
dependency.description_one: The {{dependency}} app will also be installed because the {{app}} app uses it.
dependency.description_two: Please press Continue to install the {{app}} and {{dependency}} apps.

update.title: {{number}} app update
update.updateWarn: Do not quit the Manager during the update.

dependency.title: Uninstall {{app}} and related apps?
dependency.description: Apps on your device that need the {{app}} app will be uninstalled too.

FirmwareUpdateRow.title: Firmware version {{version}} available
FirmwareUpdateRow.subtitle: Please use Ledger Live Desktop to update

Installing.title: {{stepName}}...
Installing.subtitle: If requested on your device, please enter your PIN to finish the process.

FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}.</0></1>
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription1: Please note that all the apps on your device will be deleted. You can reinstall your apps after the firmware update.
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription2: This has no impact on your crypto assets.

FirmwareUpdateCheckId.title: Identifier
FirmwareUpdateCheckId.description: Please press both buttons together on your {{fullDeviceName}} if it displays the same identifier:

FirmwareUpdateMCU.title: Restart device
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc1: Disconnect your device from your computer.
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc2: Press and hold the left button, connect the USB cable then release the button when the Bootloader screen appears.

FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.title: Firmware updated
FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.description: Go to Manager to reinstall apps on your device.

StepLegacyModal.description: Imported accounts synchronize with the network only, not between Mobile and Desktop versions of Ledger Live.

info.description: Delegate your Algo to earn rewards while keeping full security and control on your assets.

steps.0: A minimum balance of 1 Algo is required to receive rewards.
steps.1: Increase the account’s balance to increase rewards.
steps.2: Perform a transaction to or from the account to claim rewards.

starter.title: Congratulations! You earned {{amount}}. Continue to claim your rewards.
starter.warning: You will be prompted to generate an empty transaction to your account. This will add your current rewards to your balance at the minimal cost of the transaction fees.

success.title: Rewards successfully claimed!
success.text: Your rewards were added to your available balance.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

warning.title: Asset already added
warning.description: You already have {{token}} asset in your Algorand account.

success.title: {{token}} asset successfully added!
success.text: You can now receive and send {{token}} assets on your Algorand account.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

delegated.title: Delegated assets
delegated.description: Delegated assets are used for Cosmos voting. This is your total number of votes.

undelegating.title: Undelegating
undelegating.description: Undelegated assets are in a timelock of 21 days, before being available.

delegationUnavailable.title: Delegation unavailable
delegationUnavailable.description: Not enough available balance in your account to start a new delegation.

delegation.delegationEarn: You can earn ATOM rewards by delegating your assets.

starter.description: Delegate your ATOM to earn rewards securely, keeping control of your assets.

steps.1: You will have to wait 21 days for the undelegation to complete.
steps.2: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

warning.description: Choose your validator wisely: Part of your delegated assets may be irrevocably lost if the validator does not behave appropriately.

success.title: You have successfully delegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated once the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

success.title: You have successfully redelegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated when the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

success.title: You have successfully undelegated your assets
success.text: Your account balance will be updated when the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

method.claimRewardInfo: They will be claimed now and added to your available balance.
method.claimRewardCompoundInfo: They will be claimed now and automatically delegated to the same validator.
method.claimRewardTooltip: Rewards will be added to the available balance
method.claimRewardCompoundTooltip: Rewards will be added to the delegated amount

success.title: You have successfully claimed your rewards. They were added to your available balance.
success.titleCompound: Your rewards were delegated to the same validator.
success.text: Your account balance will be updated when the network confirms the transaction.

verification.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

AccountHeader.title: You can earn rewards by delegating your account

voting.delegationEarn: You can now earn rewards by freezing and voting.
voting.title: Claim rewards

votes.title: Votes
votes.description: Cast your votes for one or more Representatives to start earning rewards.

remainingVotes.title: You still have votes remaining
remainingVotes.description: Cast your remaining votes to earn more rewards.

started.title: Vote
started.description: Vote for one or more Super Representatives to start earning rewards.

starter.title: Earn rewards
starter.description: Delegate TRX to a third party candidate to earn rewards. Click on continue to freeze assets and vote.

bullet.access: You can access your assets 3 days after freezing.
bullet.ledger: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

freeze.title: Freeze
freeze.description: Freeze TRX to earn Bandwidth or Energy. You can also vote for Super Representatives.

unfreeze.title: Unfreeze
unfreeze.description: Unfreeze TRX to add them back to your available balance. You will no longer earn rewards.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Cast votes for Super Representatives to earn rewards.

frozen.title: Frozen
frozen.description: Frozen assets are used for Tron voting. This is your total number of votes.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth
bandwidth.description: Bandwidth points are used to make transactions instead of paying TRX network fees. Choose Bandwidth to increase your daily free transactions.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Energy points are required to execute smart contracts. If you don't run smart contracts, there is no need to have rewards in Energy points.

claimRewards.title: Voting rewards
claimRewards.description: The TRX generated as rewards during block production can be claimed every 24 hours.

superRepresentative.title: Super Representatives (SR)
superRepresentative.description: Super Representatives play a key role in governing the TRON community by ensuring basic functions, e.g. block generation and bookkeeping.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: 127 individuals elected through voting by the entire token-holder community. Votes are sampled every 6 hours.

memo.title: Memo
memo.warning: When using a Memo, carefully verify the type with the recipient.

delegation.delegationSendWarnDesc: The amount to be sent will be deducted from your delegated account.
delegation.delegationReceiveWarnDesc: The amount received in a delegated account will be added to the total staked amount. Choose another account if you want to avoid this.
delegation.warnDelegation: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee any rewards from your validator.
delegation.termsAndPrivacy: I have read and I accept the <1>Ledger Live Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

started.title: Earn rewards
started.description: Delegate your Tezos account to a third-party validator to earn rewards securely, keeping control of your assets.

steps.1: You can manage your assets at all times.
steps.2: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

broadcastSuccessDescription.delegate: Delegation transaction broadcasted successfully. You should earn your first rewards in around 40 days, depending on the validator.
broadcastSuccessDescription.undelegate: Your account delegation will end when the operation is confirmed. You can delegate your account again at any time.

buy.title: Buy crypto via our partner
buy.description: Purchase crypto assets via Coinify and receive them directly in your Ledger account.

emptyState.description: You need to add an account before you can sell {{currency}}.

exchangeBuyCrypto.description: Purchase crypto assets via Coinify and receive them directly in your Ledger account.

swap.title: SWAP CRYPTO
